measured_by: unlabeled six-point truth rating scale (Definitely true to Definitely false)
justification: "Participants ... answered the question 'Is the information contained in this above Tweet true or false' on an unlabeled six-point scale from 'Definitely true' (coded as 6) to 'Definitely false' (coded as 1)."
construct: Perceived accuracy of social-media posts / belief that the information is true

measured_by: unlabeled six-point sharing likelihood scale (Extremely unlikely to Extremely likely)
justification: The method section states that participants responded to "'How likely would you be to share this Tweet online?' on an unlabeled six-point scale from 'Extremely unlikely' (coded as 1) to 'Extremely likely' (coded as 6)."
construct: Sharing intention / likelihood to share a tweet
